item.title: On a click
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

[quote=“God of Ikiliki, post:7, topic:135346”][quote author=fellixombc link=topic=186812.msg1690850#msg1690850 date=1187754611]

try the code i posted then, it doesn’t popup, afaik

look at this web site: http://javaisthebest.com, you see the tabs? i need those when i click updates it changed text + pic
[/quote]
Then I would use

[code]<?php
if($_GET[‘go’] == pagename){
?>
Your html shit for pagename

<? }elseif($_GET['go'] == "pagename2"){ ?>

Html for pagename2

<? }else{ ?>

Html for error page/index

<? } ?>

[/code]
Thats what I use

Your telling it wrong, its not just changing text, the URL becomes something else also
?go=pagename[/quote]
ok if you click on the updates, it opens up another page, instead of going to another page, can it be like, id=?cheese and it would echo cheese

Read full topic

item.title: On a click

item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

[quote=“fellixombc, post:6, topic:135346”][quote author=sppt link=topic=186812.msg1690739#msg1690739 date=1187749644]
try the code i posted then, it doesn’t popup, afaik
[/quote]
look at this web site: http://javaisthebest.com, you see the tabs? i need those when i click updates it changed text + pic[/quote]
Then I would use

[code]<?php
if($_GET[‘go’] == pagename){
?>
Your html shit for pagename

<? }elseif($_GET['go'] == "pagename2"){ ?>

Html for pagename2

<? }else{ ?>

Html for error page/index

<? } ?>

[/code]
Thats what I use

Your telling it wrong, its not just changing text, the URL becomes something else also
?go=pagename
